README: Yelp2018 dataset has no negative interactions, but we used the same evaluation pipeline as in our other experiments, and therefore
- recall_disliked will be nan on this dataset -> we removed it from the raw results
- pos_inputs and pos_neg_inputs settings is the same setting (because there are no negative inputs), so the results are the same -> we delete one "copy"

Split test
